animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I'm known for enjoying a particular snack.
🐘 I'm one of the largest animals on land.
💦 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when you pet me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈‍⬛ People often keep me as a pet.

animal.question: I quack and swim in ponds and lakes. I have webbed feet. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I like to eat bread.
🦆 I'm a type of bird.
🌧️ I'm often seen after it rains.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I'm the tallest mammal on Earth.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
🌿 I love to munch on acacia trees.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I'm a symbol of courage.
🐾 I'm a large cat.
🦁 I have a big mane.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. Some people keep me as a pet. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I enjoy eating root vegetables.
🐇 I have long ears.
🐾 I leave fluffy cotton behind me!

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. I am very good at climbing. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I'm a primate.
🍌 I peel my snack before eating it.
🌳 I live in the rainforest.

animal.question: I am a black and white striped horse-like animal from Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique like a fingerprint.
🌱 I eat grass.
📸 I look like I'm wearing pajamas.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can change color to hide. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I don't have any bones.
💙 I squirt ink when scared.
🌊 I'm a type of mollusk.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell on my back. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live a very long time.
🥬 I love to eat leafy greens.
🏡 I carry my home with me.

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I often wear green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunlight to grow.
🌳 I can be big or small, and some give us fruit.
🍃 Animals and insects like to come around me!

plant.question: I am a colorful face, that can be a beautiful gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many colors, like red, yellow, and pink.
🌻 Bees love to visit me.
💐 People often give me on special occasions.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I am often pickled or sliced in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a vegetable.
🥪 You might find me on a sandwich.
🧂 Salt and vinegar can be added to preserve me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the cinema. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a tall plant with yellow kernels.
🔥 I need heat to transform into something fluffy and white.
🎬 I am often enjoyed with butter and salt.

plant.question: I have a trunk but I'm not an elephant. I have leaves but I'm not a book. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🍁 Some of us lose our leaves in the fall.
🐦 Birds often build nests in my branches.

plant.question: I’m a vegetable with many layers, that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am round.
🍔 You can eat me in burger
😢 People cry when cutting me

plant.question: I am a plant that has a long stem and bright yellow face that follows the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name starts with 'sun'.
☀️ I turn my head to face the sun.
🛢️ My seeds can be pressed to make oil.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert and can store water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I often have spines or needles.
🏜️ I am adapted to dry and hot climates.
💧 Some animals get water from me.

plant.question: I am a plant whose seeds make a popular drink. I grow in warm places and need to be roasted. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ My name is associated with a morning beverage.
🌎 I am often grown in South America and Africa.
🔥 I need to be cooked at high temperatures to enhance my flavor.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a juicy fruit, and my leaves are often used in cooking, especially in Italian dishes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often red when ripe.
🍝 I am a key ingredient in pasta sauce.
🌿 I am botanically a fruit, but often used as a vegetable in cooking.
